refnamediv.refpurpose: KLIPS statistic on number of ACQUIREs

refsect1.title: OBSOLETE
refsect1.para: Note that trap_count is only supported on the classic KLIPS stack. It is not supported on any other stack and will be completely removed in future versions. A replacement command still needs to be designed

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: /proc/net/ipsec/stats/trap_count is a read-only file. It contains a hexadecimal number, the count of attempts to send PF_ACQUIRE messages. Only those successfully passed to userland are counted. Note that the userland may still have lost them on its own.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
